name: decky-ukr-badge
description: A plugin for Steam Deck that displays a badge indicating Ukrainian language support in games.
author: yataktyni

scripts.zip-dist: mkdir -p temp-release/decky-ukr-badge && cp README.md temp-release/decky-ukr-badge/ && cp LICENSE temp-release/decky-ukr-badge/ && cp main.py temp-release/decky-ukr-badge/ && cp package.json temp-release/decky-ukr-badge/ && cp plugin.json temp-release/decky-ukr-badge/ && cp -r dist temp-release/decky-ukr-badge/ && cd temp-release && zip -r ../release.zip ./* && cd .. && rm -rf temp-release
